WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

We use Visual Studio 2013 Premium Update 4 and develop applications in TypeScript 1.4. We have a very serious issue, when we start debugging the code, entering into another method in another class would freeze the whole Visual Studio. It is then stalled for at least few minutes. The only way to quickly work with the Visual Studio again is by terminating the Visual Studio process from the task manager and restart the application again.

Any ideas on how to solve this issue? Thanks in advance.
WorkItem.Summary: Visual studio 2013 freezes when debugging TypeScript

Comments.Message:
Sorry to hear about the issue with debugging in 1.4.  We'd be happy to look into it.  

The CodePlex site (this site) is no longer actively being used by the TypeScript team.  Instead, if you file a bug on the GitHub site (https://github.com/microsoft/typescript/issues) we can investigate.  If you can, please also attach a project that causes the issue to help us narrow down the cause of the issue more quickly.

I created the issue in GitHub. 
https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/1999
Thanks again. :)
